sections.comments: All CRWR Winter Term 1 (September-December) courses/sections will be held online. For this particular course, classes will include a combination of synchronous (live via Zoom) discussions, and asynchronous activities (such as watching recorded lectures, posting to discussion boards, and completing quizzes). Live discussions will be recorded and posted later online for students unable to make the appointed live timeslot. TA help will be available during specified office hours through a virtual portal.

description: Origin, theory and practice of interactive story forms. Exploring structural links between interactive theatre, gaming, and extended (virtual, mixed, and augmented) reality.
